description.en: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

title.en: The Ending, I Want to Change it

description.en: Byun Soo-ah, an impoverished novelist who only writes bad endings, is possessed by someone's curse as Choi Se-hwa, the villainess of 'End of Youth', which is currently being serialized. Can Su-ah survive and return to her original world in a novel full of traitors, sociopaths, double personalities, and psychopaths?

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

description.en:
Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire.

Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach.

And there was a “fate” that was more than he could have imagined.
description.ja:
ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。

彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。

そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。

2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。

description.en:
Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Kanaria wa Kiraboshi no Yume wo Miru

altTitles.ja: カナリアは綺羅星の夢をみる

description.en:
Ayano is a schoolgirl who dreams of pursuing a career fashion. On the day of her first ball, she encounters a beautiful girl.

Charmed by the foreign-looking girl called Tsubaki-hime, Ayano's dreams grow stronger. But Ayano's mother, looking down on her hobbies, plots to get in her way. Meanwhile, Tsubaki-hime seems to have some  kind of circumstances of her own...

This is a Taishō-era romance about girls closing in on their dreams.

(source: Yuri Hime, translated)
description.ja:
服飾の道へ進むことを夢見る女学生の文乃は、初めて舞踏会に参加した日に、美しい少女と出会った。椿姫と呼ばれる日本人離れした容姿の少女に惹かれて夢を膨らませる文乃だが、文乃の趣味をよく思っていない母が道を阻もうと画策する一方で、椿姫にも何やら事情があるようで…。

夢を巡る少女たちの大正浪漫物語。

altTitles.zh-ro: Gong Jue Jia De Du Zhi Hua
Gōng Jué Jiā De Dú Zhī Huā

altTitles.en: The Poisonous Flower of the Duke's House

description.en:
Lily Roland, the daughter of Duke Roland, stumbled upon her fiancé and her illegitimate sister having an affair! She was poisoned by the two people whom she grew up with, and thrown into the wilderness.

When her life was hanging by a thread, she was saved by a monstrous creature that had a body of a human, but a head of a beast, who turned out to be the Crown Prince, Isaac Stewart.

Isaac was cursed by a mysterious witch to turn into a bloodthirsty monster on the night when the moon is full, and Lily’s blood is his only antidote!

Isaac decides to help Lily in her revenge, but in exchange, she must marry him and assist him in lifting the curse.

"I didn't even know what had hurt me." Min Jiho, a former second-tier idol, ended his idol career, leaving only confusion in his heart. Planning to leave the entertainment industry entirely, Jiho unexpectedly encounters his idolized top actor, Kang Taeyeon, during a variety show as a substitute. This leads him to become embroiled in a light scandal...

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

altTitles.pt-br: Não É Minha Culpa Não Ser Popular!

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

title.en: In the Bizarre Invasion, I Took Over the Body of the God of Death and Became the King

altTitles.zh-ro: Guǐyì Rùqīn, Wǒ Duó Shě Sǐshén Nì Xí Chēng Wáng

altTitles.en: Strange Invasion, I Took Over the God of Death and Counterattacked to Become the King

altTitles.zh: 诡异入侵我夺舍死神逆袭称王
诡异入侵，我夺舍死神逆袭称王

description.en: Su Mu is reborn and re-enters the “Apocalypse” system, facing deadly situations where Death itself comes knocking and an array of demons and eerie creatures awaken to threaten the world. Against all odds, he turns the tables and becomes an unstoppable king, joining his teammates in a desperate fight to reverse their fate and ignite a nationwide awakening and evolution.

altTitles.ja: 君は冥土様

description.en: A girl in a maid uniform came to Hitoyoshi's house looking for a job. Her previous job was an assassin, and she is skilled in all the deadly arts, but she's a complete beginner at housework. Hitoyoshi was confused by the strange request and sent her away. But then she saved Hitoyoshi from a deadly accident, and he thought maybe they can make this work? This is a story about a maid who was a cold-hearted killer learning about new emotions. A maid who lived a lonely life in the underworld finally finding family. The start of an enjoyable daily life.
description.id: ||Seorang gadis dengan pakaian pelayan datang ke rumah Hitoyoshi untuk mencari pekerjaan. Pekerjaan dia sebelumnya adalah seorang pembunuh, dan dia sangat ahli dalam semua teknik membunuh, tapi dia sangat awam dalam pekerjaan rumah. Hitoyoshi bingung dengan permintaan anehnya itu dan memintanya pergi. Tapi kemudian gadis itu menyelamatkan Hitoyoshi dari sebuah kecelakaan maut, dan Hitoyoshi pikir dia mungkin bisa mempekerjakannya? Ini adalah kisah tentang seorang pelayan yang dulunya adalah pembunuh berdarah dingin kini belajar tentang emosi baru. Seorang pelayan yang hidup kesepian di dunia bawah akhirnya menemukan keluarga. Awal kehidupan sehari-hari yang menyenangkan dimulai!||

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

title.en: A Cool Older Lady Who Drives Me Crazy

altTitles.ja: 僕を狂わすカッコイイお姉さん

altTitles.en: A Cool Older Lady That Makes Me Crazy

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mulher mais velha legal que me deixa louco

altTitles.es-la: Una mujer mayor genial que me vuelve loco

altTitles.ja: マジンガーZ

description.en:
An alternate Mazinger Z manga by OUTA Gosaku. Not to be confused with the version by NAGAI Go.  
  
It has influence from the anime timeline of events.

altTitles.ja-ro: Sasayaku you ni Koi o Utau

altTitles.ja: ささやくように恋を唄う

altTitles.pt-br: Sussurrando Uma Canção De Amor Para Você

description.en: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…
description.es: Himari comienza la escuela secundaria y en su primer día atiende el concierto del club de música ligera en el gimnasio de la escuela, enamorándose a primera vista con la cantante Yori y confesándole su amor en los casilleros de zapatos. Buscándo a dicha cantante, Himari se entera de que Yori no es parte del mencionado club y que a ella le gusta tocar música sola en la terraza de la escuela. Allí, se entera de que Yori también se enamoró de ella.
description.fr: Himari est une lycéenne de première année qui, dès le premier jour, assiste à la représentation du club de musique au gymnase de l'école. Elle a eu le coup de foudre pour la chanteuse Yori, à qui elle s'est déclarée devant les casiers du lycée. En cherchant ledit élève plus tard, elle découvre qu'elle ne fait pas vraiment partie du club et qu'elle aime jouer de la musique seule sur le toit. Là, elle découvre que Yori aussi est tombée amoureuse d'elle.
description.ru:
Химари влюбилась в солистку группы, которая выступала на приветственной вечеринке новых студентов. После разговора с Химари Ёри — солистка группы — поняла, что влюбилась в неё с первого взгляда...

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://readmanga.io/proshepchu_tebe_pesniu_o_liubvi__A5238))
description.uk: Життєрадісна, енергійна старшокласниця Хімарі по вуха закохалася у свого семпая, на ім'я Йорі після того, як почула виступ її групи першого дня навчання. Хімарі відразу зізнається Йорі у своїх почуттях і на подив Хімарі, Йорі каже, що вона теж закохана в неї! Але коли Хімарі розуміє, що вони відчувають два різні види кохання, вона починає ставити собі питання, що ж насправді означає "любов".
description.es-la: "Whispering you a love song" es la historia de un amor a primera vista que inicia en la temporada de los cerezos en flor. Himari, una nueva estudiante de la preparatoria, queda fascinada por Yori-senpai, la vocalista de la banda de chicas que se presenta en la ceremonia de inauguración del año escolar.
description.pt-br: Himari é uma caloura do ensino médio que no primeiro dia assiste a apresentação do clube de música light na academia da escola, apaixonando-se pelo veterano e cantor Yori à primeira vista, confessando-se a ela nos armários dos sapatos. Mais tarde, procurando pelo dito veterano, Himari descobre que Yori não faz parte do clube e que, em vez disso, gosta de tocar música sozinha no telhado. Lá, ela descobre que Yori também se apaixonou por ela.

description.en: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

The noble prince falls in love with a humble commoner! A confinement of possession begins, like the game of cat and mouse… But you can't stop love, a soft bite, is my property.

---

Official English: [WebComics](http://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5f2bd8e88c252b2eb429683a), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/599375), [Pocket Comics](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)  
Official: [Japanese](https://www.comico.jp/articleList.nhn?titleNo=29866), [Vietnamese](https://www.comico.vn/title/124)

A boy named Shi Shan and his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcised demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

description.en:
Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
 Brought to you by mmk of 'Love Comedy Quest,' this is a pure love short comedy of the new era about 'neighbors'!

title.en: Isekai NTR ~Shinyuu no Onna wo Saikyou Skill de Otosu Houhou~

altTitles.ja: 異世界NTR～親友のオンナを最強スキルで堕とす方法～

altTitles.th: ISEKAI NTR ~สร้างฮาเร็มโดยไม่ให้พรรคพวกรู้~

altTitles.ko: 이세계 NTR ~절친의 여자를 최강 스킬로 함락시키는 방법~

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界NTR ～不被同伴發現地開後宮～
異世界NTR～用最強技能令摯友的女人墜落的方法～

altTitles.en: Isekai NTR: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill
NTR in Another World: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill

description.en:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
description.es: Este mundo de mierda que no es más que un juego basura, él y yo definitivamente escaparemos juntos. Entonces, todas estas mujeres molestas que intentan aprovecharse de él son solo una molestia. Lo que es peor, él parece que está comenzando a sentir algo por ellas. Por eso, por su bien, las comeré primero. Pero, ¿qué es este poder…?

description.en: Meiling tries her best to help Sakuya with her chores. A MeiSaku story.

title.en: The Older Girl Living in Her Neighborhood

altTitles.ja: 近所に住むお姉さんと女の子

altTitles.ja-ro: Kinjo ni Sumu Oneesan to Onna no Ko

altTitles.id: Si Onee-san dan Si Gadis yang Bertetangga

altTitles.en: The Older Sister Who Lives In The Neighborhood & The Girl

description.en: A ‘girl who loves the older sister’ × ‘the older sister who lives in the neighborhood’ lily series.
description.id: Sedari SD Miharu selalu mencintai Subaru, tetangganya yang lebih tua darinya, Miharu bahkan selalu menyatakan cintanya pada Subaru hampir setiap saat. Hingga Miharu dewasa, pada akhirnya cintanya yang selama ini bertepuk sebelah tangan telah usai, karena mereka kini telah resmi berpacaran. Kisah romansa beda usia yang menggemaskan pun dimulai.

description.en:
If you cannot remember, listen to your body.
If anyone discovers that slave master Ananse has lost her memory, she will be killed. So to save herself, she ropes in Solteo, a slave who hates her beyond compare. Her proposal? "Help me uphold my old image, and you'll be freed." His reply? "I'll make you regret ever requesting that, my master."
description.ko:
“눈 뜨세요, 아난시 님. 이 일을 허락한 건 당신입니다.”
“아읏…! 미안….”
“아까 말씀 드렸을 텐데요. 주인은 노예에게 절대 사과하지 않습니다.”

파 제국 최대 규모의 노예 상단주이자 희대의 악녀인 아난시.
어느 날 모든 기억을 잃은 채 눈을 뜬 그녀는 살아남기 위하여
자신의 노예, 솔테오에게 위험한 거래를 제안한다.
기억을 잃은 자신을 돕는다면 그를 풀어주겠노라고.

위험한 욕망과 뒤틀린 집착 속 자신을 둘러싼 비밀을 쫓는 한 여자의 이야기,
<그 노예들의 사육법>

description.en: In a post-apocalyptic world ruled by gods, Driven by the desire to avenge his family, slain by a God, he plunged into the abyss of death. "O Void, lend me your power, The power to slay the gods…!"

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: 変人のサラダボウル＠comic

description.en:
While trailing someone, the poor detective Sousuke Kaburagi runs into Sara, an imperial princess from another world who uses black magic. Sousuke and Sara gradually begin living together, but in the blink of an eye, Sara becomes accustomed to modern-day Japan...

Meanwhile, Livia—a female knight who transferred to the world after Sara, is enjoying a surprisingly pleasant life, even though she is homeless. The two otherworldly individuals who live a pleasant and strong life influence Sousuke and the other oddballs who live here, such as a devilish lawyer, a divorce agent, and a cult leader. 

---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453038)
description.ja:
異世界の皇女、岐阜で無双！？

貧乏探偵・鏑矢惣助は、尾行中に天から降ってきた金髪の美少女・サラに遭遇。
彼女は自身を異世界の皇女だと言い、とんでもない魔術を披露する。
なし崩し的に惣助の家に居候することになったサラは、
なぜか探偵の仕事に興味を持ちはじめ…？
サラの従者である女騎士・リヴィアをはじめ、変わり者たちが続々登場！
岐阜を舞台に贈る、天下無双の群像喜劇！！

title.en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni: Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha to Yobareta Ato ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero: The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family

description.en:
In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord’s army was a lone hero named Lloyd. 

Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd’s companion!? 

This is the story of a man, hailed as the strongest, yet unable to recognize his own worth, finding a “family”.
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

title.en: This is Obviously a Yuri Manhua

altTitles.zh-ro: Ru ni suo jian zhe shi baihe man

altTitles.fr: En effet, il s'agit d'un yuri

description.en:
When the timid Wu You moves to a new high school, she quickly grows attached to her new deskmate, the gregarious Ye Yin. But there is more than meets the eye with Ye Yin, and as the days pass, Wu You's feelings begin to deepen.   
A love story between two secondary school classmates.  

Author's Lofter: [占](https://zhan6019.lofter.com/)
Author's Weibo: [@这里是占](https://www.weibo.com/u/6016748885)

title.en: Maou-sama no Machizukuri! ~Saikyou no Dungeon wa Kindai Toshi~

altTitles.ja: 魔王様の街づくり！～最強のダンジョンは近代都市～

altTitles.zh-hk: 打造魔王大人的城鎮！～近代都市就是最強的地下城～

altTitles.zh: 打造魔王大人的城镇！ ~近代都市就是最强的地下城~

altTitles.ru: По проекту дьявола: современный город сложнее любых подземелий

altTitles.ja-ro: Maō-sama no Machi-dzukuri!~ Saikyō no Dungeon wa Kindai Toshi ~

altTitles.th: สร้างเมืองกันเถอะค่ะ! คุณพ่อจอมมาร!

altTitles.zh-ro: Dǎzào mówáng dàrén de chéngzhèn! ~Jìndài dūshì jiùshì zuì qiáng dì dìxià chéng ~

altTitles.en: Dungeon Builder: The Demon King's Labyrinth is a Modern City!

description.en: Beings that create and control monsters and demons, beings that build and reign over malicious labyrinths, the chosen individuals to possess an overwhelming Unique Skill… They are the Demon Lords. Demon Lords entice people to come to the labyrinth they’ve built and eat the people’s despair as their nourishment. However, Creation Demon Lord Procell has decided that he will obtain people’s hopes and not their despair as nourishment, and built a happy town instead of a malicious labyrinth to collect human beings. This is the story of an eccentric Demon Lord, with all its ins and outs.
description.ja:
「合格だ。新たな“魔王”の誕生を、私は歓迎するよ」

魔王――恐怖のダンジョンに君臨し人間の感情を喰らう存在。“新人”魔王として異世界で目覚めたプロケルは稀少スキル【創造】を駆使し配下を生み出していくが、彼が目指すダンジョンとは異世界の常識を覆す革新的なものだった。それは――魔物と人間が共存する街、≪理想郷（アヴァロン）≫。

平和を実現するため、優しき魔王は【風】の魔王との【戦争】を乗り越えていく――。

title.en: Ghoul ga Sekai wo Sukutta Koto wo Watashi dake ga shitteiru

altTitles.ja: グールが世界を救ったことを私だけが知っている

altTitles.en: Only I Know the Ghoul Saved the World

description.en:
“I’m not a hero. I’m a monster that devours monsters.” In a chaotic world where ferocious monsters run rampant, there was a “monster” who inherited the title of “hero” in the holy city, the last bastion of humanity on the brink of extinction. Alice, a rookie adventurer, was attacked by a large pack of dog people (Kobolds) during her first ‘dungeon’ exploration. The one who saved her life was Leon, the third-generation “Savior” hero, who, despite having the body of a monster (Ghoul), possesses a human heart.

“I’m nothing but a defiled ghoul who keeps on killing monsters.”

“No, you’re the only hero who can save the world.”

For some reason, Alice, who admires him, applies to become Leon’s disciple.

altTitles.ja: 残酷な神が支配する

altTitles.en: A Cruel God Reigns in Heaven
Psycho Suspense: A Cruel God Reigns

altTitles.ja-ro: Zankoku na Kami ga Shihai Suru

description.en:
A Savage God Reigns portrays the tale of two step-brothers – Jeremy and Ian – as they strive to discover their separate paths towards redemption.  
 
---
- **Won the 1st Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 1997**
description.ja: 友達に恵まれ、ボランティアと勉強に励む幸せな生活を送っていたジェルミの日常は、ある男との出会いで一変する。母・サンドラの婚約者で大金持ちの英国紳士・グレッグ。ジェルミの苦痛に満ちた地獄の日々が始まった

title.en: Shijou Saikyou no Mahou Kenshi, F Rank Boukensha ni Tensei Suru ~Kensei to Matei, 2 Tsu no Zense o motta Otoko no Eiyuutan~

altTitles.en: The Strongest Magical Swordsman Ever Reborn as an F-Rank Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 史上最強の魔法剣士、Fランク冒険者に転生する　～剣聖と魔帝、2つの前世を持った男の英雄譚～

altTitles.zh: 最强之人转生成F级冒险者

altTitles.ko: 사상 최강의 마법검사, F랭크 모험자로 전생한다~검성과 마제, 2개의 전생을 가진 남자들의 영웅담~

description.en: Yuri was the hero who saved the world, being called "Demon Emperor" in his first reincarnation and "Sword Saint" in his second reincarnation. However, before he knew it, he was considered a "monster" and was shunned by people. Yuri finally gets fed up and decides to live 100% for himself next time. He reincarnates into the future and is immediately attacked by monsters. As he defends himself, Yuri acquires the skills of his previous lives and quickly annihilates his enemies. Eventually, Yuri arrives at the adventurers guild and decides to start his life as an F-rank novice adventurer while hiding his true strength.
description.id: Aizawa Yuri telah bereinkarnasi sebanyak 2x dan ia telah lelah menjadi penguasa ini dan itu. Dengan skill miliknya memungkinkan ia mendapatkan artefak reinkarnasi, dan ia memulai kesehariannya di dunia barunya!
description.ja: 一度目の転生では《魔帝》、二度目の転生では《剣聖》と呼ばれ、世界を救った勇者ユーリ。しかし、いつしか《化物》と人々に疎まれる存在になっていた。ついに嫌気が差したユーリは、次こそ100%自分のために生きると決意。未来の世界に再び転生する。その転生直後から襲い来るモンスターたち。咄嗟に対応するうちに、ユーリは次々と前世・前前世のスキルを取得し、あっという間に敵を殲滅していく。やがてギルドにたどり着いたユーリは、《魔帝》と《剣聖》の最強の力を秘めながら、Fランクの駆け出し冒険者として生活を始めることにするのだった――。

description.en: A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse (Fan Colored)

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere ka to Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en: A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...

description.en: Geunyeong, infamous for his wild and reckless lifestyle, is a fake shaman trying to scam his way out of a huge debt. One day, during one of his fake rituals, a handsome man appears, begging him to stop, and then collapses. He quickly takes him to his shrine and they spend a passionate night together, only to discover that he's actually a goblin! He offers to pay off Geunyeong's debt in exchange for yang energy. Alright, the deal's on! #Reincarnation #Supernatural #PureHeartedTop #BeautifulBottom #PromiscuousBottom

altTitles.vi: Ta Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta Ở Tokyo Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta, Sáng Tạo Ra Đô Thị Truyền Thuyết

description.en: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed to the parallel world of Jiangshi, and found that this world was full of various horror and weirdness, and ordinary humans were as fragile as paper in front of them. He used a notebook called "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals and contain weirdness, absorb the weird rule ability "use magic to defeat magic", and become a monitor who fights against weirdness, and fights with his partners against the coming doomsday-level weirdness...
description.vi:
Sau khi xuyên không tới đất nước Nhật Bản trong thế giới song song, Kanbaru Shinji có được một quyển sổ ghi chép tên là Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị Thực Lục.
Mọi truyền thuyết đô thị cậu ghi vào đó đều có thể trở thành sự thật.
Mà Nhật Bản ở thế giới này còn thiếu khuyết rất nhiều truyền thuyết đô thị từng xuất hiện trong kiếp trước như là Hanako nhà vệ sinh, Thiếu Nữ Đến Từ Địa Ngục, Quý bà Hachishaku, Cuộc gọi của Mary, Con Mắt Trong Khe Hở...
Kanbaru Shinji: “Để ta khiến cho Nhật Bản này quần ma loạn vũ đi!”
Tóm tắt theo tiểu thuyết gốc, bản manhua đã chỉnh sửa rất nhiều từ tên nhân vật cho đến bối cảnh, vui lòng theo dõi truyện để biết thêm chi tiết.

title.en: The Ten Thousand Clans Invasion: Guardian of the Rear

altTitles.zh: 万族入侵：全民参战，我留守后方

altTitles.zh-ro: Wan Zu Ru Qin: Quanmin Canzhan, Wo Liushou Houfang

altTitles.en: Invasion of All Races: All the People Join the War, I Stay Behind

description.en: Invasion of the Ten Thousand Clans, universal superpowers, the era beyond time has arrived! In this age, all citizens are drafted to resist the foreign races and defend against external humiliation. Nan Ziying, at the tender age of adulthood, chooses to stay behind at the recruitment center, serving as logistical support. Many soldiers are disappointed, the youth scorn him, and white-haired elders take up arms and leave, leaving him behind with only women, children, and the elderly to guard the rear. Later, Nan Ziying awakens five great abilities and silently prepares. In this era where countless clans reign supreme and the times are filled with tragic heroism, ‘I am the calamity of these ten thousand clans!'

title.en: The Monster Male Lead Living Under My Bed

altTitles.ko: 내 침대 밑에 괴물 남주가 산다

altTitles.en: The Monster Male Lead Lives Under My Bed

altTitles.es-la: El monstruo protagonista vive debajo de mi cama

description.en:
Chris, a detective specializing in serious crimes, has been pursuing the culprit of a murder case for five years. During his investigation, he is unexpectedly saved by Anton.
"Who are you, really?"
"If you're curious, spend the night with me."
Everything about their relationship is suspicious, yet Chris finds himself irresistibly drawn to Anton.

For a very long time, the Baek family has been haunted by the legendary existence known as "Illishine." Hong Soorim, who has been imprisoned for ten years due to suspicions about this existence, finally shows a mark on his body upon turning twenty. The company that has been keeping her decides to strike a deal with both Chairman Baek and his son, Baek Wookyung. Wookyung offers a higher price than his father to meet Soorim. As Soorim accepts his fate, he tries to use Wookyung to his advantage. Despite their age difference, Wookyung finds himself drawn to Soorim...

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

description.en: A Cuju-loving young prince, somehow transmigrated to the present day, using his talent in Cuju, he leads his highschool soccer club that is on the line of being disbanded to a miracle!

Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

title.en: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou Sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga (Colored)

altTitles.ja: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou Sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga

description.id:
**Pertumbuhan cheat? Kekuatan sihir tak terbatas? Kemampuan untuk menggunakan semua arketipe? Apa gunanya semua itu jika kematian instan mengakhiri segalanya dengan satu serangan?** 

Saat terbangun dalam kekacauan dan pembantaian saat perjalanan sekolah, Yogiri Takatou menemukan bahwa semua teman sekelasnya telah dipindahkan ke dunia lain! Dia entah bagaimana berhasil tidur selama seluruh kejadian itu, melewatkan pemberian — kekuatan yang diberikan kepada orang lain oleh seorang Sage misterius yang muncul untuk memindahkan mereka. Yang lebih buruk, dia dan seorang teman sekelas lainnya ditinggalkan dengan kejam oleh teman-teman mereka, dijadikan umpan untuk mengalihkan perhatian seekor naga yang sedang mendekat. 

Meskipun tidak terlalu terganggu oleh pemikiran tentang kematian, dia dengan enggan memutuskan untuk melindungi satu-satunya temannya. Lagipula, monster Level 1000 yang rendah tidak ada artinya melawan kekuatan rahasianya untuk memanggil Kematian Instan dengan satu pikiran! 

Jika dia bisa tetap terjaga cukup lama untuk menggunakan kekuatannya itu, tentu saja...

altTitles.ja: 理香さん、結婚してください！

title.en: Secretly More Powerful than the Hero

altTitles.en: I Was More Overpowered Than the Hero, so I Hid My Power!

altTitles.es-la: Era más fuerte que el héroe así que oculté mi poder

altTitles.th: แกร่งเกินผู้กล้า แต่ซ่าไม่ได้

description.en:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…

As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

altTitles.ja: 日常

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.uk: Хоча назва вказує на щось буденне, вона є абсолютним протилежним до того, що коїться у манзі. Дії відбуваються у дуже дивній школі, де директор не проти побоксувати з оленем. Або робот, у руці якого сховано тістечко. Звісно не обійшлося без буденності, як от коли вірша забув вивчити і вчиш на уроці. Або картковий дім, який ти вже майже добудував, руйнується вщент! Словом, небуденна буденність.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...
